post.subject: Teyvat SEA Exploration
post.content: Dear Traveler, "Genshin Impact" will collaborate with one of the world's largest aquariums, the S.E.A. Aquarium, from September 12, 2024 to October 28, 2024. This marks the first-ever partnership between "Genshin Impact" and an aquarium, promising Traveler a brand-new collaborative experience. Sigewinne, the head nurse of the Fortress of Meropide will be featured in the event, offering Traveler a close encounter with a variety of marine life and the opportunity to explore the mysteries of the deep sea. Please continue to follow Genshin Impact's official social media for more updates. Stay tuned! ✨ Early bird tickets for the S.E.A. Aquarium collaboration package are now on sale. For more details, please visit:

post.subject: Encounter Points Will Be Accumulated, and Bosses Will Respawn Much Faster! | Developers Discussion - 07/05/2024
post.content: ·Dear Traveler, The latest Developers Discussion has arrived~ Today, we'll be introducing the optimizations that will be released in Version 4.8. To improve your gaming experience, we've added some new features and updated existing systems, so let's check them out! In addition, following the official launch of the new gameplay mode "Imaginarium Theater," we are also continuing to monitor Travelers' feedback. The initial intention behind the design of "Imaginarium Theater" was to provide Travelers with new and diverse combat experiences through the introduction of new scenarios. However, there are indeed various shortcomings in the current gameplay, particularly in the lack of sufficient positive feedback for different party lineups during battles. Therefore, in the upcoming adjustments, we will continue to focus on elemental reactions and consider designing more strategically powerful and user-friendly mechanisms for everyone to consider.

post.content: 〓Event Duration〓 2024/06/25 10:00:00 – 2024/07/01 03:59:59 〓Event Rewards〓 〓Eligibility〓 Adventure Rank 20 or above 〓Event Details〓 ● The event features 8 stages, each of which has 3 difficulty levels to choose from. Once you have enough Phase Variance, you will gain powerful buff(s) for a certain duration that can help you complete the challenge goals quickly. ● Defeat opponents in the specified manner to gain Phase Variance more quickly. ● Food or other items cannot be used during the challenges.

post.subject: New Products Released in Genshin Impact's Official Amazon Merchandise Store!
post.content: Hello, Traveler! A variety of new Genshin Impact merchandise is now available in our official Amazon store! This time, we've brought the cute and quirky Springy Hu Tao Chibi Figure to you, together with the Day of Destiny Series Bordered Posters featuring the birthday illustrations of various Mondstadt and Liyue Harbor characters. Melodies of an Endless Journey and Genius Invokation TCG themed merchandise will also be available for sale, which includes a collection of badges, photo cards, stands, and more. Also, special promotion discounts will be available for selected items. Don't miss out! Visit the store to find out more products and promotion details >>>
